name: Cabela's Big Game Hunter 10th Anniversary Edition: Alaskan Adventure
name_original: Cabela's Big Game Hunter 10th Anniversary Edition: Alaskan Adventure
description:
Cabela's Big Game Hunter 10th Anniversary Edition: Alaskan Adventure is a sports, racing and arcade game developed by Magic Wand Productions. It was originally released in 2006. It was published by Activision Value Publishing. Most rawgers rated the game as "Exceptional".
You can play Cabela's Big Game Hunter 10th Anniversary Edition: Alaskan Adventure on PC.
